verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, newline Sweetest name I know, newline Fills my ev'ry longing, newline Keeps me singing as I go.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There's within my heart a melody. newline Jesus whispers sweet and low: newline "Fear not, I am with thee; peace, be still," newline In all of life's ebb and flow.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: All my life was wrecked by sin and strife; newline Discord filled my life with pain. newline Jesus swept across the broken strings, newline Stirred the slumb'ring chords again.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Feasting on the riches of His grace, newline Resting 'neath His shelt'ring wing, newline Always looking on His smiling face, newline That is why I shout and sing.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Tho' sometimes He leads thro' waters deep, newline Trials fall across my way, newline Tho' sometimes the path seems rough and steep, newline See His footprints all the way.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Soon He's coming back to welcome me newline Far beyond the starry sky. newline I shall wing my flight to worlds unknown; newline I shall reign with Him on high.
